src_original: utpannobandhumatyānṛpativalakūleyo vipaśvīnināmbāṁ yasyāśītisahasrānamaranagurorā yūnosīgdatānāṁcaṁ yenāvāptaṁ jinanvaṁ daśavara balinā pāṭalāvṛkṣamūlaṁ naṁvande jñānavāri praśamita sakalatkeśavānhi jinindra || 1 ||  vaṁṇe pṛthvīvarāṇā mahati pūkhareyaḥ prajāśā' ruṇākṣa varṣāṇāmāyūrāsītsakalaguṇidheryyāsaptāyūtāni |
tgt_original: utpanno vandhumatyāṃ nṛpativarakule yo vipaśyītināmnā  yasyāśītisahasrāṇyamaranaragurorāyurāsīd gatānām |  yena prāptaṃ jinatvaṃ daśabalabalinā potalāvṛkṣamūle  taṃ vande jñānavāri praṇamitasakalaṃ kleśavahniṃ jinendram || 1 ||  vaṃśe pṛthvīśvarāṇāṃ mahati puravare yaḥ prajāto'rūṇākṣo

src_original: saṁprāptoyenabodhiḥ parahita paṭūnāpanāṣaṇurī kasyamūttetaṁ vande jñāneśa śiśikhina mṛtvivaraṁdrāpta saṁsārapāraṁ || 2 ||
tgt_original: varṣāṇāmāyurāsīt sakalaguṇanidheryasya saptāyutānām |  saṃprāptā yena bodhiḥ parahitapaṭunā puṇḍarīkasya mūle  taṃ vande jñānarāśiṃ śikhinamṛṣivaraṃ prāptasaṃsārapāram || 2 ||

src_original: yojātonoye-āyāṁ praviśatayaśasa manvayepārthivānā māyuṣaṣṭhi sahasrāṇī bhayadaramateryyasaṁmyatsarāṇāṁ |
tgt_original: yo jāto nopamāyāṃ suprathitayaśasāmanvaye pārthivānā-  māyuḥ ṣaṣṭisahasrādabhavadurumateryasya saṃvatsarāṇām |

src_original: jitvātkepaṇānaśeṣā namṛtamādhi gataṁ yajaśālasya mūletaṁva ...... (136)  ndedharmma rājaṁbhūvanahitakaraṁ viśvatjuṁnāmadheyaṁ || 3 ||
tgt_original: jitvā kleśānaśeṣānamṛtamadhigataṃ yena śālasya mūle  taṃ vande dharmarājaṃ bhuvanahitakaraṃ viśvabhūnāmadheyam || 3 ||

src_original: kṣamāvatyāṁprajāto manūjapata sameyāvaśī vivaṁśe āyūrvarṣāyūtāni pravaguṇanidha-esyasya cāsīdvareṇa |
tgt_original: kṣemāvatyāṃ prajāto manujapatisame yo vaśī vipravaṃśe  āyurvarṣāyutāni pravaraguṇanidheraṣṭacatvāri caiva |

src_original: jainandrayenasatvatribhavanavadhakaraṁ jñānakhaṇḍeḥ śirīṣavande' haṁsisdadhikārya sūgatamananūmataṁ kravaktruchandammūnīndra || 4 ||  śobhāva tyāṁ dhijānāṁna rapatinihite yonvaye saṁ prasūto yakyāyūnāṁsahasrāṇyatiśaya vapūṣamtri śadāyūrvvabhūva |
tgt_original: jainendraṃ yena labdhaṃ tribhavavadhakaraṃ jñānakhaḍgeśvareṇa  vande'haṃ siṃhakāyaṃ sugatamanupamaṃ kakupchandaṃ munīndram || 4 ||  śobhāvatyāṃ dvijānāṃ narapatimahite yo'nvaye saṃprasūta-  stasyāmāyuḥ sahasrāṇyatiśayavapuṣastriṃśadevaṃ babhūva |

src_original: buddhanvaye narannāca lavaragunino dūyyare prāpta magdhaṁtaṁ vande śāsitāraṁka nakamūnimṛṣiṁdhdhastama dāndhakāraṁ ||
tgt_original: buddhatvaṃ yena ratnācalavaraguruṇaudumbare prāptamāsīd  taṃ vande śāsitāraṃ kanakamunimṛṣiṃ dhvastamohāndhakāram || 5 ||

src_original: vārānasyāṁvṛṣīpākṣi tiyatimahite vipravaṁśe bhijātoyasyatvāyū sahasrāśyātiśaya mahatārdhiśatirvvatsa rāśī ||
tgt_original: vārāṇasyāṃ kṛṣīśakṣitipatimahite vipravaṃśe'bhijāto  yasyāmāyuḥ sahasrāṇyatiśayamahitaṃ viṃśatirvatsarāṇām |

src_original: yenanya godhamūlatribhavaja sanidhiḥ śādhitojñānapiptyātaṁ vande vandanīyaṁma niṣaraṭṭaṣabhaṁ kāśā paloka nāthaṁ ||
tgt_original: yena nyagrodhamūle tribhavajalanidhiḥ poṣito divyagatyā  taṃ vande vandanīyaṃ munivaramanaghaṃ kāśyapaṃ lokanātham || 6 ||

src_original: yojānaḥ śrī viśālaḥ kapita pūravariśākka rājindra (137)

vaṁśeyasyāsīdāyurekaṁśata mihasaradāṁsarvvalokaikabaddhoṣa nirjityāśecca mulesurucimāpisadānunta rāyenavodhistaṁvandeśo sihaṁsurana ranamitaṁ buddhamādityabaṁdhu ||  jātiviprapraśaṣṭhu nṛpavaramahite ketumahyāṁgṛhītvā buddhatvaṁyaḥ kariṣyatyāmita guṇanidhirnnāga vṛkṣasyamule |
tgt_original: yasyāsīdāyurekaṃśatamiha śaradāṃ sarvalokaikabandhoḥ |  nirgatyāśvatthamūle namucimapi satā'nuttarā yena bodhi-  staṃ vande śākyasiṃhaṃ suranaranamitaṃ buddhamādityabandhum || 7 ||  jātiṃ vipretivaṃśe nṛpavaramahite ketumatyāṃ gṛhītvā  buddhatvaṃ yena labdhamatiguṇanidhinā nāgavṛkṣasya mūle |

src_original: aṣṭāvavdāyutānikṣa pitabhagavate bhāviyagramāyu rvvandemaitrayanāthaṁtuṣita puravarāvāskitaṁ taṁmunīndraṁ ||  stutvāvi saptabuddhansakalamupagatānsa ptasaptārksa bhāsometrayaṁbāṣumaṁmetuṣita puragataṁbhā vitaṁlokanātha |
tgt_original: aṣṭāvabdāyutāni kṣapitabhagavato bhāvi yasyāgramāyu-  rvande maitreyanāthaṃ tuṣitapuravare bhāvinaṃ lokanātham || 8 ||

src_original: yatpupyaṁsaṁprasuta tubhagatiphala dadahināmeva sarvvācchitvā saṁlkeśayāśo nmunayaśvavarāniṣṭati saṁprayāntu ||
